title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
The third point is earned for a correct product rule expression that substitutes all 4 correct numerical values. The expression does not need to be simplified. The third point can also be earned if a student imports an incorrect value for either f ′  ( 0 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@37FD@ or g ′ ( 0 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@@371F@

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The third point is earned for a correct quotient rule expression that substitutes all 4 correct numerical values. The expression does not need to be simplified.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
If h ′  ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39F7@ has a maximum of one sign error with either term, the response is eligible for the second point based on a correct evaluation with the presented h ′  ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39F7@

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.
